TopicTitle: [1.0.x, DISCONTINUED] Control Surface Action Groups - Tweak Control surfaces in flight via action groups! [May 24]

Articles.Content:
Originally suggested by [Kofeyh](http://twitch.tv/Kofeyh) of [KSPTV](http://twitch.tv/KSPTV), this mod allows players to assign enabling or disabling of Roll, Pitch and/or Yaw to action groups so they can be switched easily during flight.

Yes, these are available as part of [Actions Everywhere](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100932) by Diazo, however, AE is a lot more in depth. This mod only focuses on Control Surfaces. If you want a wider range of groups, or compatibility with FAR, consider using that instead.

**Not currently compatible with FAR. If you want these action groups to work with FAR, consider using** [**Actions Everywhere**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100932) **instead.**

![Ieqi4Go.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ieqi4Go.png)

Requires [Module Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219) (included).

Download from [GitHub](https://github.com/iPeer/ControlSurfaceActionGroups/releases/latest) ([Source](https://github.com/iPeer/ControlSurfaceActionGroups))

Alternatively, [download from KerbalSutff](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/841)

Licensed under [GPL-3.0](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html)

This mod includes version checking using [MiniAVC](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79745). If you opt-in, it will use the internet to check whether there is a new version available. Data is only read from the internet and no personal information is sent. For a more comprehensive version checking experience, please download the [KSP-AVC Plugin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79745).
